title: Which is true of neuron in resting state

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of a neuron in the resting state?

choices.label: The inside of the cell membrane is negative compared to the outside.
The outside of the cell membrane is negative compared to the inside.
The charge of the neuron is equal inside and outside of the cell membrane.
